entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong overload resolution between `Action` and `Func<Task>` when passing a delegate with an endless loop. #61156
  • [LSP] Support language experiences for roslyn options in editorconfig files #61154
  • Building Roslyn docs mentions VS option that doesn't exist #61145
  • Incorrect name ambiguity with discard lambda parameters #61143
  • Workspace.Dispose throwing on shutdown trying to instantiate MEF components during the MEF container disposable #61140

Closed

  • Visual Studio freezes even more when bulk undoing hundreds or more actions #61063
  • Replace method with property refactoring discards trivia #40758
    Backlog
  • VS 2019 intellisense "is" operator not suggesting enum values #38997
    Backlog
  • Convert to conditional expression refactoring introduces incorrect cast to non-nullable type #40244
    Backlog
  • `fixed` keyword isn't recommended inside an unsafe local function #52296
    Backlog
  • Add an option to collapse using section automatically #44843
    17.3
  • Relax file collapsing on navigation for Source Link #60049
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Feedback about ASP.Net ExternalAccess PR #61152
    Area-IDE
  • Update light bulb workarounds to apply through 17.2 Preview 6 #61151
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61147
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Generate Variable: parameter does not get introduced prior to optional parameters/params parameter #61138
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [LSP] Reuse workspace solutions for requests when LSP contents match #61139
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude more duplicate files we ship in Core folder #61153
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61155
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Take trivia from old method references when replacing them with generated property references #61150
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support utf8 strings in the virtual char service #61149
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Hard select item from default source when filter text is empty #61121
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve performance of SourceText.IsBinary on .NET Core #61148
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Implement suggested refactorings #61135
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Adjust tests to ensure abstract statics are not supported in C#10. #61133
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Suggest `fixed` keyword in unsafe local functions #61146
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61141
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61085
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Revert to pass isBlocking as a parameter #61123
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState #61131
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE
  • Handle some possible null-references #61132
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • assert property is override when reporting `ERR_AutoPropertyMustOverrideSet` #61125
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE
